text: Little Britain is a British television sketch comedy show. It was shown on the BBC from 2003â€“2006. It was created by and stars David Walliams and Matt Lucas. It was narrated by Tom Baker. The show was about various characters in the UK. In 2020, it was taken off streaming services due to racist humour as a result of the George Floyd protests. == Other websites == * Category:2003 British television series debuts Category:2006 British television series endings Category:2000s British comedy television series Category:2000s LGBT television series Category:2000s satirical television series Category:BBC television comedy Category:British LGBT television programmes Category:British satirical television series Category:Cross-dressing Category:English-language television programs Category:LGBT comedy television series Category:Television sketch shows
title: Little Britain
